offers.title: Loyalty Cashback Bonus
offers.description: Get 5% cashback on all purchases for the next 3 months as a thank you for being a valued customer.
offers.email_subject: You've Earned a Special Cashback Reward!
offers.email_body:
Dear {customer_name},

We truly appreciate your loyalty over the past {tenure} months. As a token of our gratitude, we're offering you an exclusive 5% cashback on ALL purchases for the next 3 months!

This means more rewards on everything from groceries to travel. No minimum spend required.

To activate this offer, simply continue using your card as usual - the cashback will be automatically credited to your account.

Thank you for being part of our family.

Warm regards,
{company_name}

offers.title: Free Card Upgrade
offers.description: Complimentary upgrade to Silver card with no annual fee for the first year.
offers.email_subject: You're Invited: Free Card Upgrade Inside
offers.email_body:
Dear {customer_name},

Great news! Based on your excellent account history, you've been selected for a complimentary upgrade to our Silver Card.

Here's what you'll enjoy:
• Higher credit limit
• Premium travel insurance
• Airport lounge access (2 visits/year)
• No annual fee for your first year (save $95!)

This exclusive offer is valid for the next 14 days. Simply reply to this email or call us to upgrade instantly.

We'd love to continue growing with you.

Best regards,
{company_name}

offers.title: Annual Fee Waiver
offers.description: Complete annual fee waiver for the next year to show our appreciation.
offers.email_subject: Your Annual Fee Has Been Waived!
offers.email_body:
Dear {customer_name},

We know that every dollar counts, and we want you to know how much we value having you with us.

That's why we've decided to waive your annual fee for the upcoming year - that's a savings of ${fee_amount}!

No action needed on your part. This has already been applied to your account.

We hope this small gesture shows our appreciation for your continued trust in us. If there's anything we can do to serve you better, please don't hesitate to reach out.

With gratitude,
{company_name}

offers.title: Bonus Reward Points
offers.description: Earn 10,000 bonus points after spending $500 in the next 30 days.
offers.email_body:
Dear {customer_name},

Ready for your next adventure? We're giving you an easy way to get there faster!

Earn 10,000 bonus reward points when you spend just $500 in the next 30 days. That's enough for:
• A free domestic flight
• 2 nights at select hotels
• $100 in gift cards

You're already {points_away} points away from your next reward. This bonus could get you there!

Start earning today - your purchases already count.

Happy spending,
{company_name}

offers.title: Lower Interest Rate
offers.description: Reduced APR by 3% for the next 12 months on all purchases and balance transfers.
offers.email_subject: Good News: Your Interest Rate Just Got Better
offers.email_body:
Dear {customer_name},

We're pleased to inform you that you qualify for a special reduced interest rate!

Starting immediately, your APR will be reduced by 3% for the next 12 months. This applies to:
• All new purchases
• Balance transfers
• Cash advances

This could save you hundreds of dollars over the year. The new rate is already active on your account.

Thank you for being a loyal customer. We're committed to helping you achieve your financial goals.

Sincerely,
{company_name}

offers.title: Premium Concierge Access
offers.description: Complimentary 6-month access to our premium concierge service.
offers.email_body:
Dear {customer_name},

As one of our most valued customers, we'd like to offer you something special.

Enjoy 6 months of complimentary access to our Premium Concierge Service, including:
• 24/7 personal assistant
• Restaurant reservations at exclusive venues
• Travel planning and booking
• Event tickets and experiences
• Personal shopping assistance

Simply call our dedicated line or use the mobile app to access your concierge anytime.

You deserve the very best.

With appreciation,
{company_name}

offers.title: Double Points Weekend
offers.description: Earn double points on all weekend purchases for the next 2 months.
offers.email_body:
Dear {customer_name},

Weekends just got more rewarding!

For the next 2 months, you'll earn DOUBLE points on every purchase made on Saturday and Sunday. Whether it's brunch with friends, shopping, or a weekend getaway - you'll rack up points twice as fast.

No registration needed. Just use your card and watch your points grow!

Make every weekend count.

Cheers,
{company_name}

offers.title: Emergency Credit Increase
offers.description: Instant credit limit increase of 25% with no credit check required.
offers.email_subject: Your Credit Limit Has Been Increased!
offers.email_body:
Dear {customer_name},

We've got great news! Based on your excellent payment history, we've pre-approved you for a 25% credit limit increase.

Your new limit: ${new_limit}

This gives you:
• More purchasing power
• Better credit utilization ratio
• Greater financial flexibility

No credit check required. Simply reply 'YES' to this email to activate your new limit instantly.

We're here to support your financial journey.

Best,
{company_name}

offers.title: Welcome Back Bonus
offers.description: Special reactivation bonus of $50 statement credit for returning customers.
offers.email_subject: We Miss You - Here's $50 to Welcome You Back
offers.email_body:
Dear {customer_name},

We've noticed you haven't used your card recently, and honestly, we miss you!

To show you how much we value your relationship, we're offering you a $50 statement credit when you make any purchase in the next 30 days.

It doesn't matter how small - even a coffee counts! Just use your card once, and $50 will be credited to your account.

We'd love to have you back.

Warmly,
{company_name}

offers.title: Family Card Benefit
offers.description: Add a family member with no additional annual fee and shared rewards.
offers.email_subject: Share the Benefits with Your Family
offers.email_body:
Dear {customer_name},

Great news for your family! You can now add a family member to your account with:

• No additional annual fee
• Shared rewards pool
• Separate spending limits
• Individual purchase notifications

This is perfect for a spouse, partner, or adult child. They'll enjoy all the same benefits while helping you earn rewards faster together.

Apply online in just 2 minutes or reply to this email.

For you and yours,
{company_name}

offers.title: Exclusive Partner Discounts
offers.description: Access to exclusive discounts at 500+ partner merchants for 6 months.
offers.email_body:
Dear {customer_name},

Starting today, you have exclusive access to special discounts at over 500 partner merchants!

Save on:
• Dining: Up to 20% off at popular restaurants
• Shopping: 15% off at major retailers
• Travel: Special rates on hotels and car rentals
• Entertainment: Discounted movie tickets and events

Simply show your card or use promo code VALUED2024 at checkout.

This exclusive access is valid for 6 months. Start saving today!

Enjoy,
{company_name}

offers.title: Priority Customer Support
offers.description: Skip the queue with dedicated priority support line access.
offers.email_subject: Your Dedicated Support Line is Now Active
offers.email_body:
Dear {customer_name},

Your time is valuable. That's why we've upgraded your account to include Priority Customer Support.

Your benefits:
• Dedicated phone line with <30 second wait times
• Direct access to senior support specialists
• Extended hours: 6 AM - 12 AM, 7 days a week
• Callback option - we'll call you back if preferred

Your priority number: 1-800-XXX-XXXX
Your PIN: XXXX

We're here whenever you need us.

At your service,
{company_name}

offers.title: Payment Flexibility Plan
offers.description: Option to skip one payment or convert large purchases to installments.
offers.email_subject: Need Some Flexibility? We've Got You Covered
offers.email_body:
Dear {customer_name},

Life happens, and we understand. That's why we're offering you some extra flexibility with your account.

Choose one of these options:

1. Skip-a-Payment: Skip your next payment with no penalty or late fee. Your account stays in good standing.

2. Installment Plan: Convert any purchase over $100 into easy monthly installments with 0% interest for 6 months.

To activate either option, simply reply to this email or log into your account.

We're in this together.

With care,
{company_name}

offers.title: Travel Insurance Upgrade
offers.description: Complimentary comprehensive travel insurance for all trips booked with the card.
offers.email_subject: Travel with Peace of Mind - Free Insurance Included
offers.email_body:
Dear {customer_name},

Planning your next trip? Travel worry-free with our complimentary travel insurance!

When you book with your card, you're automatically covered for:
• Trip cancellation (up to $10,000)
• Medical emergencies abroad (up to $500,000)
• Lost or delayed baggage (up to $2,500)
• Flight delays (up to $500)

No registration needed - coverage is automatic when you pay with your card.

Bon voyage!

{company_name}

offers.title: Personalized Financial Review
offers.description: One-on-one consultation with a financial advisor at no cost.
offers.email_body:
Dear {customer_name},

As a valued customer, we'd like to offer you a complimentary one-on-one session with one of our certified financial advisors.

In this 45-minute consultation, you can discuss:
• Investment strategies
• Retirement planning
• Tax optimization
• Debt management
• Any financial questions you have

This service normally costs $250 - it's our gift to you.

Book your session: [link] or call 1-800-XXX-XXXX

Investing in your future,
